page.title: 01TEMPLE GRAFTON DISTRICT
page.content: Temple Grafton, Binton and Hillborough are three villages in rural Warwick- shire near Stratford-upon-Avon. These three villages are mainly agricultural places and have been for the last hundred years. Most of the people in these villages go to work and shop in Stratford, Birmingham, or Redditch. The only village shop is in Binton. Welford-upon-Avon is a larger commuter village for the industrial cities of Birmingham and Coventry. All these four villages are by or near the River Avon. The area includes the river valley and the hills to the north. The main Stratford to Evesham road divides the area. Welford and Hillborough to the South and Binton and Temple Grafton to the North.
